text:
If you remove/comment-out/change the Ajp12 connector to the Ajp13 connector in the server.xml file, tomcat will be unable to stop itself with the 'tomcat stop' command. That it when it calls apache.tomcat.startup.tomcat -stop (via the tomcat.sh script) it will not kill itself I have to manually kill the java processes. 

I would expect tomcat to use the Ajp13 or the Ajp12 connector to shutdown.
